metadata.title: Fidjoo - Meaningful Screen Time Through Creative Storymaking
metadata.description: Fidjoo transforms screen time into creativity by letting children build their own animated storybooks while developing imagination and soft skills.

hero.heading: Turn Screen Time Into Creative Storytime
hero.subheading: Fidjoo helps children build their own animated storybooks through meaningful, engaging, and positive screen time.

section1.title: Meaningful Screen Time
section1.description: Turn passive screen time into a creative experience. With Fidjoo, children build their own animated storybooks step by step.

bullet1.title: Build-Your-Own Stories
bullet1.description: Kids shape their story through simple choices - hero, world, challenge, ending.

bullet2.title: Creativity First
bullet2.description: Fidjoo encourages imagination, decision-making, and storytelling skills.

bullet3.title: See Their Ideas Come Alive
bullet3.description: Every choice transforms the story, helping children understand cause and effect.

section2.title: A Shared Family Moment
section2.description: Fidjoo creates a safe and fun space where parents and kids imagine, build, and enjoy stories together.

bullet1.title: Co-Creation
bullet1.description: Designed to strengthen the bond between children and parents through shared play.

bullet2.title: Helpful Story Prompts
bullet2.description: Simple suggestions guide children when they don't know how to begin.

bullet3.title: Listen & Share
bullet3.description: Children can listen to their completed story or share it with their family.

section3.title: Safe & Kid-Friendly
section3.description: Fidjoo replaces endless scrolling with safe, purposeful, and positive screen time - no ads, no distractions.

bullet1.title: Protected Space
bullet1.description: All creations stay private and under parental supervision.

bullet2.title: Parent Controls
bullet2.description: Easily manage profiles, permissions, and visibility settings.

bullet3.title: Designed for Kids
bullet3.description: Every story stays positive, age-appropriate, and aligned with healthy digital habits.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.intro: Fidjoo uses a credit system. 1 animated story = 3 credits. Choose the option that suits you best.

familyStarter.name: Family Starter
familyStarter.description: Perfect for families who want to create regularly

safe.question: Is Fidjoo safe for children?
safe.answer: Fidjoo is 100% ad-free and built as a closed, kid-friendly environment. All creations stay private and fully supervised by parents.

what.question: What is Fidjoo?
what.answer: Fidjoo is a creative app where children turn simple choices into their own animated storybooks, replacing passive screen time with meaningful, imaginative play.

ages.question: What ages is Fidjoo designed for?
ages.answer: Fidjoo is ideal for children aged 5 to 12, with stories and experiences adapted to different reading and developmental levels.

offline.question: Does Fidjoo work offline?
offline.answer: Yes. Once a story is created, it can be enjoyed offline anytime. A connection is only needed for creating or customizing new stories.

cost.question: How much does Fidjoo cost?
cost.answer: You can start for free with one story. Then, flexible subscriptions and credit packs allow families to choose the option that fits them best.
